content.label: The game does a phenomenal task of blending the classic board style of a worker placement game with the more a more sleek, highly polished digital version. This looks like it be a fan favorite for a long time. This is a MUST buy if you like worker placement games at all.

Seems like a really great adaptation of board game to app, but no pass and play local option seems like a huge oversight that board games apps need to include. Will update to 5 stars when this is added.

Update: Pass and play added

title.label: Faithful reproduction of a wonderful game

content.label: Looking forward to release of the expansions.
App crashes pretty regularly. Not crazy about spending 10bucks on an app that crashes. Maybe it‚Äôs my phone? Guess I will stick to the tabletop version of the game. Great game!
Love it

title.label: Might be the best board game app out there

content.label: This game is fantastic.

I love the boardgame. I love the app; its very well done. 

Now, let‚Äôs develop the expansions shall we.? üòä

Very disappointed. This game shows promise but has too many bugs to justify the 10$.  The campaign game  works but the cartographer card is glitched. The Local AI games is broken and unplayable.  Once the game is stated you can‚Äôt pick up your worker to place. Strangely this does work in the tutorials and campaign. Game should have been tested before released. This developer usually does much better. Very disappointing!
The graphics, gameplay and interface are perfect for the game. This game would be off the charts if it had a better AI.

title.label: With some work, this app could be the best of all board game renditions...

content.label:
The graphics, gameplay and music are outstanding.  I have 20+ board game apps and think the quality of this game is off the charts.  However, as someone who plays solo practically exclusively, I am disappointed that there is only one difficulty level and it is way too easy.  Someone new to the game would probably win on his/her first try.  The game is so easy, there is little to no replay-ability solo.

This game could be the greatest solo experience if the challenge were there.

Good game port but the AI is lacking. As someone who does not enjoy gaming with online opponents (racist screen names, dropping midgame, lack of opponents, etc) I look for games with at least decent AI‚Äôs. Raiders falls on this one. Consistently winning by at least 20 points after just a couple plays. Scaled difficulty would be nice.

I really enjoy the tabletop version and this digital version is a great implementation.  

Some minor issues, doesn‚Äôt seem like I can start a solo game on iPad and continue on iphone.  Also, where is the button to look at my cards/crew when planning actions?  All I see are the portraits.

I love this game. I‚Äôve never played the board game but this game makes me want to go buy a board game for the first time in 30 years. Seriously, the graphics are joyous (love the Art Deco font) and the game mechanics are simple to master while allowing for nearly limitless strategies.

I very much appreciate that this games] is for purchase. Thank you for not nickel-and-dining me to death. I hope this game shows up on Apple Arcade for the Apple TV, too.

title.label: Fantastic and Faithful to Board Game Version

content.label:
Raiders of the North Sea is one of my very favorite board games and the app version is a faithful and accurate recreation.  The gameplay is top notch, and the art, animations, and transitions are super smooth and immersive.  One minor issue seems to be picking up and dragging workers was sometimes difficult - but it looks as though the developers have already addressed this issue in a patch.

Can‚Äôt recommend this game enough, and love that I can take it wherever I go!

title.label: Came back to change my rating

content.label: I initially gave this 1 star based on the fact I couldn‚Äôt pick up workers, therefore the game was unplayable. The developers quickly remedied that and now it works great. Thanks for fixing things so quickly. I‚Äôd been waiting for this game a long time and really wanted to love it. I now do.

I haven‚Äôt played the physical version of this game so I can‚Äôt vouch for the conversion. That said this game is a solid worker placement game. 1 star knocked off for the worker pickup issue. To those having that problem, if you zoom in it‚Äôs easier to pick up the workers. Pretty sure dire wolf will fix this quickly.
I‚Äôm playing on a iPhone 8 and can‚Äôt even play the tutorial!

title.label: If only all Eurogames could receive this treatment

content.label: Just starting to explore this beauty but I am already bowled over by the care and attention to detail that‚Äôs evidently been put into this implementation. The game board has swirling clouds and fun animations but none of the bling gets in the way of essential functions. I‚Äôm not sure how strong the AI is but it is certainly not a push over. Bravo!
I just downloaded game and I can‚Äôt even get past first tutorial.  I can‚Äôt seem to move my workers.  Please help, I was very excited at first to try the game :-(

I love this board game and when the app doesn‚Äôt glitch it‚Äôs great. It crashes on start up from time to time. It has also had some freezing problems during multiplayer as well. If these problems get fixed then my rating goes to 5 stars.

I can‚Äôt find a support link on your website, so hoping you‚Äôll see this here. 

The challenge ‚Äòpay less for an action using the cartographer, huntsman, scout, trader, or recruiter‚Äô isn‚Äôt working. I have used the actions on all these townsfolk but the trader now (matter of luck of the draw) over the course of three games without scoring and clearing the challenge after the game. 

Great app! Love it. Buy buy buy!
really hard to click and drag... more frustrating than fun right now.

title.label: Fun game, but buggy at release.

content.label: The game itself is enjoyable, but it frequently has issues when trying to pickup workers on my iPad Pro. Additionally, on my device, the game does not fill the entire screen, there is a black border roughly 1/4‚Äù wide around the entire screen. This may be the cause of the pickup issue as I have fewer pickup problems when I aim closer to the edge of the screen, as if the game actually filled the whole screen.

title.label: The Best Board Game to App

content.label:
This is one of the best from physical board game to app game I‚Äôve played. The game is as fun as the physical version and plays as true to it as possible. 

Two MUST ADD features:
A vertical orientation option (Naturally suits the board and could solve the current scrolling issues).
Pass and Play mode. 

Love this game. Great work from Shem!
Beautiful implementation of the board game.
Perfect digital adaptation! Rare issue with grabbing a worker, but it's not only rare, but certain to be quickly corrected and not worth a lower star rating. Way to go!!

I own the board game and now realize I got one rule wrong and was a little off on another.

The presentation in the game is excellent. I can‚Äôt wait to play the app more and the physical board game with my family and friends soon. I‚Äôll see if they would be willing to play using the app after they understand the rules.

title.label: I love the original game and now I can enjoy it on the go!

content.label:
Big tabletop fan here, specifically anything Shem designs. While there are minors bugs with the initial release, the gameplay itself genuinely captures the essence and theme of the game while making it easy to understand and comfortable on a mobile device. If you are a tabletop fan, this is a must have.

Please please please make more! I need these on my long plane flights for work.

I love this game! I‚Äôve played the board game a ton. I would agree with the other review. The game doesn‚Äôt always recognize when I grab a worker. Also, is it possible to add how online gameplay works? Seems like there isn‚Äôt any guidelines on how turns work, meaning do you have unlimited time to take a turn or will the game automatically disqualify you if you take too long? I understand the game was just released, so I don‚Äôt expect for anything to be done immediately. Thanks!

It is a pain to grab my workers on my iPhone 7 not sure why it‚Äôs not recognizing that I am touching the worker but it is very frustrating. Very fun game if not for that issue hopefully it gets fixed so I can enjoy the game.
